nodes.text: Chromants were a creature native to the Outer Rim Territories planet Elphrona. They lived in nests which could contain around 100 individuals. Residents of the planet typically called in extermination units when they were having trouble with the creatures. Before being called to deal with a Nihil raid, Jedi Master Loden Greatstorm was planning to assist a claim which was having trouble with a chromant nest. Greatstorm's Padawan, Bell Zettifar, was also interested in helping, but knew better than to ask as his master wanted him working on mastering controlled descent.
